A

analyzeArray() - Method in class ArraySort
This method should be called to start analyzing the array to determine the possibility to sort.
analyzeReversalMethod() - Method in class ArraySort
This method analyzes the cloned array to figure out whether it is possible to sort by reversing a sub-segment.
analyzeSwapMethod() - Method in class ArraySort
This method analyzes the cloned array to figure out whether it is possible to sort by swapping any 2 elements.
ArraySort - Class in <Unnamed>
This class analyzes an array, attempts to sort and outputs the method by which the array can be sorted in ascending order.
ArraySort() - Constructor for class ArraySort
Default constructor which initializes the instance variables
ArraySort(int[]) - Constructor for class ArraySort
Constructor, to be called while creating the object of this class

clonedArray - Variable in class ArraySort
Clone of the original array
clonedMatrix - Variable in class Matrix
2D array to store clone or copy of a matrix
cloneMatrix() - Method in class Matrix
Returns a copy of the original 2D array which stores matrix.
complexFactorial(int) - Method in class Factorial
Computes and returns the factorial of a number passed as parameter.

F

Factorial - Class in <Unnamed>
This class accepts an integer from standard input and computes the factorial of a number.

G

get(int, int) - Method in class Matrix
This method returns the value located at indexes specified by parameters r (Row) and c (Column).
getArray() - Method in class Matrix
Returns the original 2D array which stores elements of the matrix
getFactorial(int) - Method in class Factorial
This method initiates the factorial computation process.
getLIndex() - Method in class ArraySort
Returns the index of the left element set by calling either ArraySort.analyzeSwapMethod() method or ArraySort.analyzeReversalMethod() method
getRIndex() - Method in class ArraySort
Returns the index of the right element set by calling either ArraySort.analyzeSwapMethod() method or ArraySort.analyzeReversalMethod() method
getSortMethod() - Method in class ArraySort
Returns the sort method (Either one of the sort method constants) set by ArraySort.analyzeArray() method

I

isArraySorted() - Method in class ArraySort
Checks whether the array is sorted or not and returns true/false.

lindex - Variable in class ArraySort

matCols - Variable in class Matrix
No of columns of the matrix
Matrix - Class in <Unnamed>
This class abstracts the required functionalities of a real time matrix.
Matrix() - Constructor for class Matrix
This private constructor initializes the class properties
Matrix(int, int) - Constructor for class Matrix
This constructor sets the number of rows and columns of the matrix, and creates the 2D array to store matrix contents.
matrix - Variable in class Matrix
2D array to store matrix
MatrixRotation - Class in <Unnamed>
An object of this class accepts matrix order, matrix values and number of rotations from standard input and performs matrix rotation by using an object of the Matrix class and prints the output on standard input.
MatrixRotation() - Constructor for class MatrixRotation
The default constructor
matRows - Variable in class Matrix
No of rows of the matrix
method - Variable in class ArraySort
The sorting method as indicated by sort method constants
multiply(List<Integer>, List<Integer>) - Method in class Factorial
Accepts two parameters of type java.util.List, performs multiplication and returns result of type java.util.List.

N

NOT_POSSIBLE - Static variable in class ArraySort
Sort method constant to indicate that the array cannot be sorted either by swapping elements or by reversing a sub-segment.
numArray - Variable in class ArraySort
The original array

P

print() - Method in class Matrix

R

reverseArray(int, int) - Method in class ArraySort
Reverses the elements of the array starting from index l to r, inclusive of both the indexes.
rindex - Variable in class ArraySort
Stores index of the right most element in a sub-segment
rotate(int) - Method in class Matrix
Rotates the matrix, a number of times as specified by the times parameter.
rotateOnce() - Method in class Matrix
Rotates the matrix once.
rotatePart(int, int, int) - Method in class Matrix
Rotates the selected 4 segments of the matrix once.

S

set(int, int, int) - Method in class Matrix
This method sets value of an element of the matrix identified by parameters r (row) and c (column).
simpleFactorial(int) - Method in class Factorial
Computes and returns the factorial of a number passed as parameter using the recursive call method.
SORT_BY_REVERSAL - Static variable in class ArraySort
Sort method constant to indicate that the array can be sorted by reversing a sub-segment
SORT_BY_SWAP - Static variable in class ArraySort
Sort method constant to indicate that the array can be sorted by swapping 2 elements
SORTED_ALREADY - Static variable in class ArraySort
Sort method constant to indicate that the array is already sorted
swap(int, int) - Method in class ArraySort
Swaps the elements specified by the parameters index1 (left) and index2 (right)
